metadata.title: scr-support_origin_unique
metadata.author: Gertjan Franken
metadata.description: The reading system must assign a unique origin to each EPUB publication. This EPUB publication will display its origin, which will be compared to the origin of the EPUB publication of the "scr-support_origin" test.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: sec-untrusted-consent_network
metadata.author: Gertjan Franken
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains references to remote resources, which should only be fetched if the reader consents.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: sec-untrusted-consent_scripting
metadata.author: Gertjan Franken
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains multiple scripts, which should only be executed if the reader consents.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-file-urls
metadata.author: Gertjan Franken
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains iframes referring to resources on the user's local file system through a file URL. The reading system should refrain from loading these resources.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-storage-delete
metadata.author: Gertjan Franken
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains a script that adds data to local storage. If this data is persistent (i.e., the data is still available when closing and reopening the EPUB file), users should be able to delete it.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-audio-no-clipend
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System plays until the end of the audio track in the absence of a clipEnd attribute in the smil file.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-navigation
metadata.author: Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: When navigating to another page, the media overlay playback position updates accordingly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-linked-records
metadata.author: Matthew Chan
metadata.description: Reading System must process and display the title and creator metadata from the package document. An ONIX 3.0 format linked metadata record exists, but contains neither title nor creator metadata.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-text-emphasis
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS properties -epub-text-emphasis-color, -position, and -style
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-support_xhtml-fxl
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System supports playback for XHTML content documents in fixed layout.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-support_xhtml-load-fxl
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the playback starts at the right places in the MO definition, including entries in the middle of the file in fixed layout.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-support_xhtml-load-next-fxl
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System supports playback of XHTML content documents in fixed layout with content switching automatically as playback goes on. The switch also involves a switch of MO files.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-timing-synchronization_multiple_audio-fxl
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System implements media overlays with a SMIL file referring to two audio files in fixed layout.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-timing-synchronization_svg-fxl
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Basic media overlay test in SVG content in fixed layout with CSS styling.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-non-text_img
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The navigation document contains a normal link, and a link with an image content with alt text.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-non-text_img_title
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The navigation document contains a normal link, and a link with an image content with title and alt text.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-hyphens
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-hyphens
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-line-break
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-line-break
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-text-align-last
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-text-align-last
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-text-combine-horizontal
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-text-combine-horizontal
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-text-orientation
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-text-orientation
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-text-transform
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS value -epub-fullwidth
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-text-underline-position
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS properties -epub-text-underline-position
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-word-break
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-word-break
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: css-epub-writing-mode
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Tests for the prefixed CSS property -epub-writing-mode
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-opus
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An OPUS audio file is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-pkg-flow-paginated
author: Matt Garrish
Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests on handling overflow content with the "rendition:flow" property set to "paginated". The content should be dynamically paginated (i.e., not scrolled) by the reading system.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-pkg-flow-scrolled-continuous
author: Matt Garrish
Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests on handling overflow content with the "rendition:flow" property set to "scrolled-continuous". The content should be presented as one continuous scrolling document (i.e., not paginated).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-pkg-flow-scrolled-doc
author: Matt Garrish
Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests on handling overflow content with the "rendition:flow" property set to "scrolled-doc". Each of the chapters in this publication should be vertically scrollable, and swiping horizontally should moves from one to the next.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-reflow-align-x-center
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: For reflowable content, reading systems that support align-x-center must center each page.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-viewport-meta-prop
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: Reading systems must ignore rendering instructions in the meta viewport delaration other than the dimenstions.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-timing-synchronization_fxl
author: Ivan Herman
Wendy Reid
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System implements media overlays in fixed layout publications.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-foreign_bad-fallback
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: This is a test of manifest fallbacks where both the spine item and the fallback are likely to be unsupported. The spine item is a DMG, with a fallback to a PSD file. Reading systems may raise an error on the ingenstion workflow.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-foreign_image
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: An HTML content file contains a PSD image, with a manifest fallback to a PNG image. This tests fallbacks for resources that are not in the spine.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-foreign_json-spine
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: This EPUB uses a JSON content file in the spine, with a manifest fallback to an HTML document. If the reading system does not support JSON, it should display the HTML.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-foreign_xml-spine
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: This EPUB uses an ordinary XML content file with mimetype application/xml in the spine, with a manifest fallback to an HTML document. If the reading system does not support XML, it should display the HTML.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-foreign_xml-suffix-spine
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: This EPUB uses an custom XML content file with mimetype application/dtc+xml in the spine, with a manifest fallback to an HTML document. If the reading system does not support XML, it should display the HTML.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-xml-non-validating_comment
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: This is a test of XML processing. The nav doc should not appear in the spine because the itemref is commented out.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-xml-external-id
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains a reference to an external entity. The reading system must not resolve it. Reading systems may raise an error on the ingenstion workflow.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: XHTML content outside the initial containing block (ICB) is clipped.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb_invalid_meta
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Reading systems SHOULD attempt to extract 'width' and 'height' values even if the tag's syntax is invalid.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb_repeated-in-meta
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Reading system should use the first declaration of a 'width' or 'height' (i.e., ignore repeated declarations).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb_device_sizes
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The viewport can be set to device-width, resp. device-height, to fill the full display area.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb_multi
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The same XHTML content outside the initial containing block (ICB) is clipped but the effect is different because the two pages have a different viewport setting.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb_multi_declarations
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Only the first of multiple viewport meta tags is retained, the second is ignored.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-xhtml-icb_units
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Units of lengths in an ICB declaration are ignored, values are in pixels.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-svg-support
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An SVG image is displayed as a content document (not as part of an XHTML file).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-svg-icb_multi
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The same SVG content outside the initial containing block (ICB) is clipped but the effect is different because the two pages have a different viewport setting.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-timing-synchronization_svg
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Basic media overlay test in SVG content with CSS styling.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-svg
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An SVG image is displayed as part of the XHTML content (as a reference, not embedded).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-readingsystem-support_iframe_svg
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements the epubReadingSystem object in container-constrained SVG document (e.g., an iframe).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-readingsystem-support_svg
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements the epubReadingSystem object in a spine-level SVG document.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-layout-default
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The default value for pagination must be 'reflowable'.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-layout-pre-paginated
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:layout is pre-paginated, reading systems must display one page per spine item.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-layout-pre-paginated-spreads
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When the layout is pre-paginated, pages are displayed with no gaps when in synthetic spreads.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-orientation-default
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: rendition:orientation is not specified. Therefore, it has the value "auto" and reading systems should display the EPUB in the orientation of the device.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-orientation-landscape
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: rendition:orientation is landscape, Reading Systems should either display the content in landscape or inform the user it should be.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-page-spread-combined
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:page-spread-right and -left are applied to adjacent spine items, they should be displayed in a synthetic spread.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-page-spread-left
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:page-spread-left is applied to a spine item, it should be displayed on the left side of the synthetic spread.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-page-spread-right
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:page-spread-right is applied to a spine item, it should be displayed on the right side of the synthetic spread.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-spread-auto
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:spread is "auto", the reading system can choose to display spine items in a synthetic spread.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-spread-both
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:spread is "both", the content should appear in a synthetic spread regardless of reading system orientation.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-spread-default
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: The default value for rendition:spread should be "auto" if not specified. When rendition:spread is "auto", the reading system can choose to display spine items in a synthetic spread.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-spread-landscape
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: If rendition:spread is "landscape", synthetic spreads should be rendered only when the reading system is in landscape orientation.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-fxl-spread-none
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:spead is "none", spine items must not appear in synthetic spreads.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-page-layout-both
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: If a reflowable spine item follows a pre-paginated one, it should appear on the next page.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-page-layout-both-spread
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: If a reflowable spine item has a page-spread-* value, it must be honored.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: lay-rendition-flow-pre-pag
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: The reading system must ignore rendition:flow properties when processing pre-paginated spine items.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-svg-css
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: CSS styling is applied to an SVG content document.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-svg-css-inclusion
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: CSS changes the color of an SVG image that is embedded in the XHTML content by inclusion.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-lang_but_not_content
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The package document's language is set to 'fr' but the content document is not annotated for language. The content document should not become automatically 'fr' but should be the default 'en'.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: fxl-page-spread-break
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: For a fixed-layout book, page-spread properties must take precedence over CSS page-break-before
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-font_obfuscation
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: An obfuscated (TrueType) font should be displayed after de-obfuscation.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-font_obfuscation-bis
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: An obfuscated (TrueType) font should not be displayed after de-obfuscation, because the obfuscation used a different publication id.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-support_xhtml-load
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the playback starts at the right places in the MO definition, including entries in the middle of the file.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-support_xhtml-load-next
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System supports playback of XHTML content documents with content switching automatically as playback goes on. The switch also involves a switch of MO files.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-audio-exceeding-clipend
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System ignores the clipEnd attribute in the smil file's par element if it exceeds the length of the audio file.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-audio-no-clipbegin
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System starts at the beginning of the audio track in the absence of a clipBegin attribute in the smil file.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-css
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System implements the associated CSS styling for media overlays.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-ignore
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether Reading System not supporting media overlays ignores the relevant items and attributes.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-support_xhtml
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System supports playback for XHTML content documents.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-timing-synchronization_multiple_audio
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System implements media overlays with a SMIL file referring to two audio files.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-tts_multi
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the reading system implements Text-to-Speech as a fallback when no audio content is provided. Several fragments are defined in the SMIL file.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-tts_single
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests whether the reading rystem implements text-to-speech as a fallback when no audio content is provided. Only one fragment is defined in the SMIL file.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support-fallback
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system follows a fallback for scripting content in case scripting is not supported.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-not-support_ccscript-modify-host
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system allows a container-constrained script (in an iframe) to modify the "host" content's DOM.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-not-support_ccscript-modify-size
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system allows a container-constrained script (in an iframe) to modify the enclosing iframe's dimensions.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-svg-embedded
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An SVG image is embedded in the XHTML content (as inline SVG).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-xhtml-support
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An XHTML file is displayed as a content document.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: fxl-spine-overrides_behave-as-global
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Pre-paginated document, with a spine item overriding the global setting to use reflowable layout.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: fxl-spine-overrides_behave-as-global-bis
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Reflowable document, with a spine item overriding the global setting to use pre-paginated layout.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: fxl-spine-overrides_duplicate
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Pre-paginated document, with a spine item overriding the global setting to use reflowable layout, but repeating the override property value back to pre-paginated. The second setting must be ignored.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-zip-comp
metadata.author: Zheng Xu
metadata.description: MUST treat any OCF ZIP container that uses compression techniques other than Deflate as in error.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pss-support
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: A separate footnote popup (or equivalent) is displayed if the RS supports structural semantics.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pss-support_ignore-title
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The footnote popup is not displayed for the second page, because the setting is on the title element.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-zip-mult
metadata.author: Zheng Xu
metadata.description: MUST treat any OCF ZIP container that splits the content into segments as in error.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-readingsystem-features
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements the required epubReadingSystem feature string queries.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-readingsystem-support
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements the epubReadingSystem object.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-external-links
metadata.author: Zheng Xu
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains a link to an external website. The reading system should open it in a new browser instance after the reader's consent.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-external-links_consent
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The XHTML content document contains a 'mailto:' link. The reading system should ask for the reader's consent before opening an email application.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support_scrolled-continuous
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests handling overflow content with the "rendition:flow" property set to "scrolled-continuous". The publication is presented as one continuous scroll from spine item to spine item. This feature is optional if the reading system supports scripting.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support_scrolled-doc
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Tests on handling overflow content with the "rendition:flow" property set to "scrolled-doc". Each of the chapters in this publication should be vertically scrollable, and swiping horizontally should moves from one to the next. This feature is required if the reading system supports scripting.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-metainf-inc
metadata.author: Zheng Xu
metadata.description: An extra configuration file, not in the reserved files' list, is added to the META-INF folder; this file must be ignored.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-metainf-manifest
metadata.author: Zheng Xu
metadata.description: An ancillary manifest file, containing an extra spine item, is present in the META-INF directory; this extra item must be ignored by the reading system.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-audio
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System obeys the clipBegin and clipEnd attributes.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-css-fonts
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: TrueType, OpenType, WOFF, and WOFF2 font resources are referenced from @font-face rules.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_link-leaking-relative
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Use a relative link with several double-dot path segments from the content to a photograph. The folder hierarchy containing the photograph starts at the root level; the relative image reference exceeds depth of hierarchy.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_link-path-absolute
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Use a path-absolute link, i.e., beginning with a leading slash, from the content to a photograph. The folder hierarchy containing the photograph starts at the root level.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_link-relative
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: A simple relative link from the content to a photograph. The folder hierarchy containing the photograph starts at the root level.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: mol-timing-synchronization
author: Ivan Herman
Marisa DeMeglio
metadata.description: Tests whether the Reading System implements media overlays.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-spine_in-spine-no-list-style
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The reading system's rendering of the navigation must not show numbering, disregarding the list-style-type declared in the navigation document.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir_but_not_content
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The package document's language is set to 'he' and direction 'rtl' but the content document is not annotated for language and direction. The content document should not become automatically 'he' and 'rtl'.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-readingsystem-support_iframe
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements the epubReadingSystem object in container-constrained document (e.g., an iframe).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements scripting in a spine-level document (i.e., whether a simple inline script is executed at all).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support_iframe
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements container-constrained scripts (i.e., whether a simple inline script is executed at all in an iframe).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support_svg
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Checks whether the reading system implements scripting in a spine-level SVG document (i.e., whether a simple inline script is executed at all).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-data-urls_top-level-content
metadata.author: Matthew Chan
metadata.description: The reading system must display an img (where src is a data URL) positioned at the bottom of the first page of a fixed layout ebook rather than opening the data URL as thought it were its own top-level content document.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: fxl-layout-duplication
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:layout is duplicated, EPUBCheck must return an error.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: fxl-page-spread-center
metadata.author: Wendy Reid
metadata.description: When rendition:page-spread-center is applied to a spine item, the document should be displayed in the center of the screen and not in a synthetic spread.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-order-svg
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: Basic test of whether a reading system can display SVG spine items in the correct order.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-access
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: The navigation document contains a single link and can be accessed through reading system controls.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-duplicate-item-hyperlink
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: The spine contains several references to the same content document. The reading system must move to the position of the first duplicate in the reading order when following a hyperlink.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-duplicate-item-rendering
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: The spine contains several references to the same content document. The reading system must not skip the duplicates when rendering the reading order.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-duplicate-item-ui
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: The spine contains several references to the same content document. The reading system must allow the duplicates to be independently bookmarked or otherwise recognized in the UI.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_relative
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: The manifest refers to an XHTML file in an arbitrary subfolder that is relative to the package's own arbitrary folder. The reading system must be able to find the content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-manifest-unlisted-resource
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The XHTML content references an image that does not appear in the manifest. The image should not be shown.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-version-backward
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: “Reading Systems MUST attempt to process an EPUB Publication whose Package Document version attribute is less than "3.0"”. This is an EPUB with package version attribute set to "0", to see if a reading system will open it.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-order
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: Basic test of whether a reading system can display spine items in the correct order. The test fails if the reading system presents content in the order in which the file names sort, or if it presents files in manifest order rather than spine order.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir-auto_root-rtl
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The 'dc:title' element contains text whose proper rendering requires bidi control. The element's 'dir' attribute is set to 'auto' and the 'dir' attribute is set to 'rtl' on the package element; the title should display incorrectly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir-auto_root-unset
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The 'dc:title' element contains text whose proper rendering requires bidi control. The element's 'dir' attribute is set to 'auto'; the title should display incorrectly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir_rtl-root-ltr
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The 'dc:title' element contains text whose proper rendering requires bidi control. The element's 'dir' attribute is set to 'rtl' and the 'dir' attribute is set to 'ltr' on the 'package' element; the title should display correctly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir_rtl-root-unset
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The 'dc:title' element contains text whose proper rendering requires bidi control. The element's 'dir' attribute is set to 'rtl'; the title should display correctly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir_unset-root-rtl
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The 'dc:title' element contains text whose proper rendering requires bidi control. The root's 'dir' attribute is set to 'rtl'; the title should display correctly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir_unset-root-unset
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The 'dc:title' element contains text whose proper rendering requires bidi control. The element's 'dir' attribute is not set; the title should display incorrectly.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-mathml-support
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: A Presentation MathML equation is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: cnt-svg-css-reference
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: CSS does not change the color of an SVG image that is embedded in the XHTML content by reference.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-mp3
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An MP3 audio file is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-mp4
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: An MP4 audio file is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-gif
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: A GIF image is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-jpeg
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: A JPEG image is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-png
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: A PNG image is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-cmt-webp
metadata.author: Dan Lazin
metadata.description: A WEBP image is displayed as part of the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: scr-support_origin
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The origin values of scripted content files are displayed. They must be shared by all spine-level scripts in the publication.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_origin
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: The origin value is displayed. The origin must be unique for each user-specific instance of the publication.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_parse-leaking-relative
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Parse, in Javascript, a relative link with several double-dot path segments from the content to a photograph. The folder hierarchy containing the photograph starts at the root level; the number of segments exceeds the depth of the folder hierarchy.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_parse-path-absolute
metadata.author: Ivan Herman
metadata.description: Parse, in Javascript, a path-absolute URL, i.e., beginning with a leading slash, from the content to an image. The folder hierarchy containing the image starts at the root level.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-dir_creator-rtl
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The 'dc:creator' element's 'dir' attribute is set to 'rtl'; the creator's name should display right-to-left.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-activation
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: Activating a link in the navigation document relocates the reading position to the target of the link.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-spine_in-spine
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The navigation document is referenced in the spine and can be accessed through reading system controls.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: nav-spine_not-in-spine
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The navigation document is not referenced in the spine, but can still be accessed through reading system controls.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-collections-unknown
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document contains a collection with an unknown role. The reading system must open the EPUB successfully.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-unknown
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document contains a spine item with unknown properties. The reading system must open the EPUB successfully.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-progression-pre-paginated
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: In a pre-paginated publication whose XHTML content sets 'dir="rtl"', the spine sets 'page-progression-direction="ltr"'. The pages must appear from left to right.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-package_arbitrary
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The EPUB contains three valid package files and three corresponding sets of content documents, but only one of the packages, in an unusual subdirectory, is referenced by the container.xml file. The reading system must use this package.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-package_multiple
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The EPUB contains three valid package files and three corresponding sets of content documents, all referenced by the container.xml file. The reading system must use the first package.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-nonlinear-activation
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: An itemref in the spine is marked as non-linear. Although it (possibly) cannot be accessed through the table of contents, it can be reached from a link in the XHTML content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-progression-default
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: In a publication set as using an RTL language, the spine does not set 'page-progression-direction', so it is implicitly 'default'. The pages must appear from right to left.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-progression_ltr
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The spine sets 'page-progression-direction="ltr"'. The pages must appear from left to right.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-spine-progression_rtl
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The spine sets 'page-progression-direction="rtl"'. The pages must appear from right to left.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: ocf-url_manifest
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The manifest refers to an XHTML file in an arbitrary subfolder. The reading system must be able to find the content.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-manifest-unknown
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document contains a manifest item with unknown properties. The reading system must open the EPUB successfully.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-unique-id
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document's dc:identifier is identical across two publications. The reading system should display both publications independently.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-unique-id_duplicate
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document's dc:identifier is identical across two publications. The reading system should display both publications independently.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-creator-order
author: Dave Cramer
Wendy Reid
Dan Lazin
Ivan Herman
Brady Duga
metadata.description: Several creators are listed in the package document. The reading system must not display them out of order (but it may display only the first).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-meta-unknown
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document contains a meta tag with an unknown property. The reading system must open the EPUB successfully.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-meta-whitespace
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: The package document's title and creator contain leading and trailing spaces along with excess internal whitespace. The reading system must render only a single space in all cases.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pkg-title-order
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: Several titles are listed in the package document. The reading system must use the first title (and whether to use other titles is not defined).
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-xml-non-validating_unclosed
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: An XHTML element does not have a closing tag. The reading system must produce an error.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-xml-names
metadata.author: Dave Cramer
metadata.description: An XHTML element has an invalid name with two successive colons. The reading system must produce an error.
subject: epub-test

metadata.title: pub-data-urls_browsing-context
metadata.author: Matthew Chan
metadata.description: The XHTML content contains an img element where the src attribute is given as a data URL. The reading system must display the image rather than opening it in a new top-level browsing context.
subject: epub-test
